long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WhiteProxies® Proxy Manager

The WhiteProxies® Proxy Extension is a free, versatile tool that works with any proxy provider of your choice. It enables effortless proxy management without requiring multiple steps or deep menu navigation.

Why Choose the WhiteProxies® Chrome Extension?

A proxy server acts as an intermediary between your device and the internet, allowing you to mask your actual location or access restricted websites. With the WhiteProxies® Extension, you can manage your proxies easily with just a couple of clicks.

Key Features and Benefits:
* Effortless Proxy Switching – Add and switch between multiple proxies in seconds
* One-Click Connection – Quick, seamless proxy setup
* Universal Compatibility – Connect with multiple proxy providers through one extension
* Consistent IP Retention – Maintain a steady IP across multiple requests
* Protocol Flexibility – Easily switch between HTTP(S) and SOCKS proxies
* Unlimited Proxy Profiles – Add as many proxies as you need
* Enhanced Privacy – WPAD support prevents proxy details from showing in request headers
* Setup Guide for WhiteProxies® Extension:
* Download and add the extension to your Chrome browser
* Launch the extension
* Add a proxy profile of your choice
* Connect instantly with one click

Need a Reliable Proxy Provider?

Discover WhiteProxies’ range of proxy solutions, including Residential Proxies, Dedicated Datacenter Proxies, Shared Datacenter Proxies, and Mobile Proxies. Sign up and access your dashboard to explore all available options: WhiteProxies Dashboard

For feature requests or to report issues, reach out at support@whiteproxies.io.
